bronze:Allocate.NAME: Allocate
bronze:Allocate.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] for each Status in your draw pile.

bronze:AlphaBuild.NAME: Early Access
bronze:AlphaBuild.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Insert random Status. NL bronze:Compile - bronze:Insert *Beta *Build.
bronze:AlphaBuild.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL   Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Insert random Status. NL bronze:Compile - bronze:Insert *Beta *Build.

bronze:Assembly.NAME: Reassemble
bronze:Assembly.DESCRIPTION: expansioncontent:Exhume !M! Function cards, chosen at random. Reduce their cost to 0. NL Exhaust.

bronze:Backtrace.NAME: Backtrace
bronze:Backtrace.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL   Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Compile *Error - Function Exhausts.

bronze:BetaBuild.NAME: Beta Build
bronze:BetaBuild.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL bronze:Insert random Status. NL bronze:Compile - bronze:Insert *Full *Release.

bronze:BitShift.NAME: Bit Shift
bronze:BitShift.DESCRIPTION: Choose an Encoded card to return to your hand. It gains Retain. NL Exhaust.
bronze:BitShift.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Choose an Encoded card to return to your hand. It gains Retain. NL Exhaust.

bronze:Boost.NAME: Boost
bronze:Boost.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Increase the Damage and Block values of currently Encoded cards by !M!.

bronze:Branch.NAME: Branch
bronze:Branch.DESCRIPTION: Choose: Deal !D! damage or gain !B! Block. NL The option not chosen is bronze:Encoded. NL Exhaust.

bronze:Break.NAME: Break
bronze:Break.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Compile *Error - bronze:Insert a *Burn, a *Wound, and a *Slimed.

bronze:BronzeArmor.NAME: Bronze Armor
bronze:BronzeArmor.DESCRIPTION: Gain !bauto! Artifact. NL bronze:Compile *Error - ALL enemies gain !M! Block.

bronze:BronzeOrb.NAME: Bronze Orb
bronze:BronzeOrb.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL The next Function you create costs 0. Exhaust.

bronze:BugBarrage.NAME: Bug Barrage
bronze:BugBarrage.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 *Wound. NL Deal !D! damage for each Status in hand.
bronze:BugBarrage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 *Wounds. NL Deal !D! damage for each Status in hand.

bronze:BuggyMess.NAME: Buggy Mess
bronze:BuggyMess.DESCRIPTION: bronze:Insert a *Dazed. NL Gain !M! [E] . NL bronze:Encode a *Miracle.

bronze:BurnOut.NAME: Burn Out
bronze:BurnOut.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for ALL of your Status cards, then Exhaust them. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for ALL of your Status cards (

bronze:ChargeBattery.NAME: Charge Battery
bronze:ChargeBattery.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain [E].

bronze:ChosenStrike.NAME: Cultist Strike
bronze:ChosenStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Take 3 damage. NL bronze:Encode a *Ritual *Dagger without it's *Fatal effect.
bronze:ChosenStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Take 3 damage. NL bronze:Encode 2 *Ritual *Daggers without their *Fatal effect.

bronze:ClassDefault.NAME: Class Default
bronze:ClassDefault.DESCRIPTION: Next !M! times you create a Function, bronze:Encode a copy of the first card in it.

bronze:CleanCode.NAME: Clean Code
bronze:CleanCode.DESCRIPTION: The next !M! Functions you create do not Exhaust.

bronze:CloningBeam.NAME: Merge Conflict
bronze:CloningBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL The next time you bronze:Encode a card this turn, bronze:Encode a copy of it.

bronze:Constructor.NAME: Constructor
bronze:Constructor.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL bronze:Encode a *Defend. If it is the first card, replace it with *Leap.
bronze:Constructor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL bronze:Encode a *Defend+. If it is the first card, replace it with *Leap+.

bronze:DarkDash.NAME: Dark Dash
bronze:DarkDash.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Compile *Error - bronze:Insert a *Void.

bronze:DelayedSlice.NAME: Robo-Chop
bronze:DelayedSlice.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Next turn, draw !M! additional cards.

bronze:FindAndReplace.NAME: Find and Replace
bronze:FindAndReplace.DESCRIPTION: Fetch a card from your draw or discard pile. NL Add a *Dazed where it was. NL Exhaust.
bronze:FindAndReplace.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Fetch a card from your draw or discard pile. NL Exhaust.

bronze:FineTuning.NAME: Fine Tuning
bronze:FineTuning.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Increase all numbers on Encoded cards by !M!. NL Exhaust.
bronze:FineTuning.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Increase all numbers on Encoded cards by !M!.

bronze:Flail.NAME: Flail
bronze:Flail.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !bauto! times. NL bronze:Encode a *Panacea. NL Exhaust.
bronze:Flail.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !bauto! times. NL bronze:Encode a *Panacea+. NL Exhaust.

bronze:FollowUp.NAME: Follow Through
bronze:FollowUp.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If you created a Function this turn, play this again.

bronze:ForceShield.NAME: Force Shield
bronze:ForceShield.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less [E] for each Function created this combat. NL Gain !B! Block.

bronze:ForLoop.NAME: For Loop
bronze:ForLoop.DESCRIPTION: The next card Function you create is created twice.

bronze:Format.NAME: Format
bronze:Format.DESCRIPTION: bronze:Encode X copies of *Iron *Wave. NL Gain [E] . NL Exhaust.
bronze:Format.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: bronze:Encode X+1 copies of *Iron *Wave. NL Gain [E] . NL Exhaust.

bronze:FormatEncoded.NAME: Fragment
bronze:FormatEncoded.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Encode an *Iron *Wave.
bronze:FormatEncoded.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Encode an *Iron *Wave+.

bronze:Fortify.NAME: Fortify
bronze:Fortify.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Dexterity. NL bronze:Encode an *Entrench. NL Exhaust.

bronze:Frontload.NAME: Frontload
bronze:Frontload.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL bronze:Compile - Function gains Retain.

bronze:FullRelease.NAME: Full Release
bronze:FullRelease.DESCRIPTION: bronze:Compile - Function becomes a Power with 'At the start of your turn...'

bronze:GetLatest.NAME: Get Latest
bronze:GetLatest.DESCRIPTION: Gain a random card that *Encodes another card. It costs 0 until played. NL Exhaust.

bronze:Hardcode.NAME: Hardcode
bronze:Hardcode.DESCRIPTION: Next time you create a Function, add it to your deck. NL Remove the cards used to create it (including this).

bronze:HardenedForm.NAME: Summon Orb
bronze:HardenedForm.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you create or play a Function, gain !M! Block and deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

bronze:HyperBeam.NAME: HYPER BEAM
bronze:HyperBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Put !M! *Void on top of your draw pile.

bronze:InfiniteBeams.NAME: Prime Header
bronze:InfiniteBeams.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, gain a *Strike or *Defend *Primer, chosen randomly.
bronze:InfiniteBeams.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, gain a *Strike or *Defend *Primer+, chosen randomly.

bronze:Invalidate.NAME: Invalidate
bronze:Invalidate.DESCRIPTION: Choose: Apply !M! Vulnerable and bronze:Encode a *Blind, or Apply !M! Weak and *Encode a *Trip.
bronze:Invalidate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose: Apply !M! Vulnerable and bronze:Encode a *Blind+, or Apply !M! Weak and *Encode a *Trip+.

bronze:Iterate.NAME: Iterate
bronze:Iterate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL bronze:Encode a *Pummel.
bronze:Iterate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL bronze:Encode a *Pummel+.

bronze:ItsAFeature.NAME: It's a Feature
bronze:ItsAFeature.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Curse or Status card, gain 1 temporary Strength.
bronze:ItsAFeature.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you draw a Curse or Status card, gain 1 temporary Strength.

bronze:Library.NAME: Dark Library
bronze:Library.DESCRIPTION: bronze:Insert !M! *Voids. NL At the start of your turn, gain [E].

bronze:MaxOutput.NAME: Max Output
bronze:MaxOutput.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL At the start of each turn, draw 1 additional card and bronze:Insert 1 *Dazed.

bronze:Mutator.NAME: Mutator
bronze:Mutator.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength. NL Transform a Status into a copy of this.
bronze:Mutator.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain 1 Strength. NL Transform a Status into a copy of this.

bronze:NullPointer.NAME: Null Pointer
bronze:NullPointer.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Insert a *Wound and a *Burn.

bronze:OilSpill.NAME: Oil Spill
bronze:OilSpill.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Encode a *Deadly *Poison. NL bronze:Insert a *Slimed.
bronze:OilSpill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Encode a *Deadly *Poison+. NL bronze:Insert a *Slimed.

bronze:Optimize.NAME: Optimize
bronze:Optimize.DESCRIPTION: When you bronze:Encode a card, increase its Damage and Block values by !M!.

bronze:Overheat.NAME: Overheat
bronze:Overheat.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL The next Function you create costs 0.

bronze:Overload.NAME: Copy Paste
bronze:Overload.DESCRIPTION: Play a copy of each Encoded card twice (targets chosen randomly). NL Exhaust.
bronze:Overload.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Play a copy of each Encoded card twice (targets chosen randomly).

bronze:Philosophize.NAME: Philosophize
bronze:Philosophize.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL ALL enemies gain 1 Strength. NL bronze:Encode an Inflame. NL Exhaust.
bronze:Philosophize.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL ALL enemies gain 1 Strength. NL bronze:Encode an Inflame+. NL Exhaust.

bronze:RecursiveStrike.NAME: Recursive Strike
bronze:RecursiveStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL bronze:Encode !M! copies of *Strike.
bronze:RecursiveStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL bronze:Encode !M! copies of *Strike+.

bronze:Refactor.NAME: Refactor
bronze:Refactor.DESCRIPTION: Scry !M!. NL Exhaust all cards discarded. NL Gain !B! Block for each Status card exhausted.

bronze:Repair.NAME: Repair
bronze:Repair.DESCRIPTION: Choose a Function card to expansioncontent:Exhume. NL Exhaust.
bronze:Repair.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose a Function card to expansioncontent:Exhume.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose a Function card to return to your hand.
Function cards to return to your hand.

bronze:Repulsor.NAME: Repulsor
bronze:Repulsor.DESCRIPTION: When you draw the first Status or Curse card each turn, Exhaust it and draw a card.
bronze:Repulsor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL When you draw the first Status or Curse card each turn, Exhaust it and draw a card.

bronze:Return.NAME: Return
bronze:Return.DESCRIPTION: Put a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile. NL Next turn, gain [E].
bronze:Return.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile. NL Next turn, gain [E] [E].

bronze:Separator.NAME: Separator
bronze:Separator.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Encode a *Strike. If it is the first card, replace it with *Twin *Strike.
bronze:Separator.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Encode a *Strike+. If it is the first card, replace it with *Twin *Strike+.

bronze:Shell.NAME: Blockchain
bronze:Shell.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! bronze:Faded. NL bronze:Encode a *Blur. NL Exhaust.

bronze:ShipIt.NAME: Ship It
bronze:ShipIt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for ALL of your Status cards.

bronze:Storm.NAME: The Storm
bronze:Storm.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies X times. NL If X is 3 or more, bronze:Encode an *Eye *of *the *Storm, then Exhaust.

bronze:Terminator.NAME: Terminator
bronze:Terminator.DESCRIPTION: bronze:Encode a *Repeat. NL This can only be used if *Repeat will be the final card of a new Function. NL Exhaust.
bronze:Terminator.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: bronze:Encode a *Repeat. NL This can only be used if *Repeat will be the final card of a new Function.

bronze:ThunderWave.NAME: Thunder Wave
bronze:ThunderWave.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain 1 guardianmod:Buffer. NL Exhaust.

bronze:TinkerersToolbox.NAME: Dev Tools
bronze:TinkerersToolbox.DESCRIPTION: Choose: Draw 3 cards, gain [E] [E] , or heal 8 HP at the end of combat. NL Exhaust.
bronze:TinkerersToolbox.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose: Draw 4 cards, gain [E] [E] [E] , or heal 10 HP at the end of combat. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Heal 8 HP at the end of combat.
Heal 10 HP at the end of combat.

bronze:Turbo.NAME: Turbo
bronze:Turbo.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] . NL Add a *Void into your discard pile.
bronze:Turbo.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] [E] . NL Add a *Void into your discard pile.

bronze:Undervolt.NAME: Undervolt
bronze:Undervolt.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength. NL Gain 2 Burns. NL Exhaust.

bronze:Verify.NAME: Sentient Form
bronze:Verify.DESCRIPTION: When you bronze:Encode a card, increase all numbers on it by !M!.

bronze:Virus.NAME: Virus
bronze:Virus.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Poison. NL Exhaust up to 2 cards, then bronze:Encode a *Poison *Stab for each.
bronze:Virus.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL NL Apply !M! Poison. Exhaust up to 2 cards, then bronze:Encode a *Poison *Stab+ for each.

bronze:WhirlingStrike.NAME: Piercing Shot
bronze:WhirlingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL bronze:Encode a *Cleave.
bronze:WhirlingStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL bronze:Encode a *Cleave+.

bronze:WildBeam.NAME: Cleanse
bronze:WildBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Fetch up to !M! Status cards from your draw pile. They gain Ethereal.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose a Status card to add to your hand.
Status cards to add to your hand.

bronze:Batch.NAME: Batch
bronze:Batch.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Create a Function from cards currently *Encoded. It does not Exhaust.
bronze:Batch.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Create a Function from cards currently *Encoded. It does not Exhaust and costs 0.

bronze:DazingPulse.NAME: Dazing Pulse
bronze:DazingPulse.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block NL Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Compile *Error - bronze:Insert !M! *Dazed.

bronze:Debug.NAME: Debug
bronze:Debug.DESCRIPTION: Remove all *Compile *Error effects from Encoded cards. NL Exhaust.

bronze:DecaBeam.NAME: Proto-Shield
bronze:DecaBeam.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL bronze:Compile - Gain !M! Plated Armor and bronze:Insert !bauto! *Dazed.

bronze:Decompile.NAME: Decompile
bronze:Decompile.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all Encoded cards. Gain [E] and draw a card for each card Exhausted. NL Exhaust.
bronze:Decompile.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Exhaust all Encoded cards. Gain [E] and draw a card for each card Exhausted. NL Exhaust.

bronze:DonuBeam.NAME: Proto-Beam
bronze:DonuBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL bronze:Compile - Gain !M! Strength.

bronze:Explode.NAME: Explode
bronze:Explode.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! hexamod:Soulburn to ALL enemies. NL bronze:Compile *Error - bronze:Insert !bauto! *Burn.

bronze:Spike.NAME: Spike
bronze:Spike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Compile - Gain !M! Thorns.

bronze:Ignite.NAME: Ignite
bronze:Ignite.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! hexamod:Soulburn. NL At the end of your turn, take 2 damage.
bronze:Ignite.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! hexamod:Soulburn. NL At the end of your turn, take 4 damage.

bronze:IntoTheVoid.NAME: Into the Void
bronze:IntoTheVoid.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn. NL When drawn, lose 1 Energy. NL Exhaust.

bronze:Daze.NAME: Daze
bronze:Daze.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Exhaust.

bronze:StrikePrimer.NAME: Strike Primer
bronze:StrikePrimer.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL bronze:Encode a *Strike. NL Exhaust.
bronze:StrikePrimer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL bronze:Encode a *Strike+. NL Exhaust.

bronze:DefendPrimer.NAME: Defend Primer
bronze:DefendPrimer.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL bronze:Encode a *Defend. NL Exhaust.
bronze:DefendPrimer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL bronze:Encode a *Defend+. NL Exhaust.

bronze:CastToDouble.NAME: Cast to Double
bronze:CastToDouble.DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next Function is played twice.
bronze:CastToDouble.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next !M! Functions are played twice.

bronze:EncodedCutThroughFate.NAME: Cut Through Fate
bronze:EncodedCutThroughFate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Scry !M!, draw a card.

bronze:EncodedDodgeandRoll.NAME: Dodge and Roll
bronze:EncodedDodgeandRoll.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain !B! Block.

bronze:EncodedEyeOfTheStorm.NAME: Eye of the Storm
bronze:EncodedEyeOfTheStorm.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] up to your maximum.   NL Exhaust.
